amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Education to commission and submit to Congress the results of a nonpartisan, comprehensive study on the degree to which the student aid application process under title IV complies with the requirements of the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-399 to ensure that student financial aid programs are in compliance with the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1965.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
